divs: Sighting DetailsI viewed the light while looking straight up into the sky looking at stars and other aircraft. I was at home at the time and walking to my car to go to the mall. I always look into the sky to identify aircraft, stars, satellites, planets and thought I was watching a satellite pass over at very high altitude. The "glowing light object" looked exactly like a satellite, but was traveling from South to North at satellite type speed, but maybe a little slower. I decided the "object" was a satellite, but then the "object" began to get brighter very slow (1 second interval), I thought it was still a satellite, but then it became dim got brighter at the same interval again. The "object" did this 3 times. The 3rd time the "object" was brighter and completely disappeared. Usually satellites travel completely across the sky in full view until they disappear across the horizon. The "object" traveled in a smooth straight line until it disappeared. During the observation, I felt it had an intelligent possibly telepathic presence as if "the object" noticed it was being perceived by observation before disappearing. I lost sight of the "object" when it disappeared. After the sighting, I continued my journey to the mall. The "object" could be a satellite spinning, I suppose, but I don't have the resources to check this hypothesis.
Summary: High Altitude, Satellite Glow, Brightened 3 Times at 1 second intervals and disappeared.
